segments.text: What a disaster in this kitchen!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, not even seeing the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon from that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids are making it worse by climbing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to cause more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar like it's his personal stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is slippery now; this is gross and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how messy and chaotic it's becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, but inside it's filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids shouldn't be up there without help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the whole scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
